edu.caltech.sbw
Class SignatureType

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.caltech.sbw.SignatureType
public class SignatureType
extends java.lang.Object

A SignatureType class object represents a data type in a signature.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Michael Hucka, $Author: mhucka $
See Also:
Signature, SignatureElement

Constructor Summary
SignatureType(int type, SignatureType arrayType, SignatureElement[] listContents)
          constructor.
 
Method Summary
 boolean equals(SignatureType other)
          The standard equals method of the Java Object class is overloaded to permit comparison between two SignatureType objects.
 SignatureType getArrayInnerType()
          If this SignatureType object is an array, this method returns the data type of the elements in the array.
 SignatureElement[] getListContents()
          If this SignatureType object is a list, this method returns an array of SignatureElement class objects corresponding to the types of each element in the list.
 int getType()
          Returns an integer code corresponding to the data type.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns a string representation of this signature element type.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

SignatureType

public SignatureType(int type,
                     SignatureType arrayType,
                     SignatureElement[] listContents)
constructor.

Parameters:
type - the type code for the type of this element
arrayType - if this is an array type, this parameter specifies the type of the elements in the array
listContents - if this is a list type, this parameter specifies the type of each element in the list.
Method Detail

getType

public final int getType()
Returns an integer code corresponding to the data type. The encoding of the SBW data types is on DataBlockWriter.
Returns:
an integer code for the type
See Also:
DataBlockWriter

getArrayInnerType

public final SignatureType getArrayInnerType()
If this SignatureType object is an array, this method returns the data type of the elements in the array.

Returns:
the type of elements in the array

getListContents

public final SignatureElement[] getListContents()
If this SignatureType object is a list, this method returns an array of SignatureElement class objects corresponding to the types of each element in the list.

Returns:
an array of elements corresponding to the type of each element in the list.

equals

public boolean equals(SignatureType other)
The standard equals method of the Java Object class is overloaded to permit comparison between two SignatureType objects.

Parameters:
other - a SignatureType object to compare this one to
Returns:
a boolean indicating whether the two objects are equal

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a string representation of this signature element type.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
the string name of the type
